content: We can set referrer-policy of a SPA app by using `<meta name="referrer" content="xxx" />`

In Final Fantasy VI, when a character levels up, the stats don't increase, but the damage number is calculated based on the character's base stat and the level number. The game has a strange system that differs from what I remember as a kid.
In FFVI, when obtaining Setzer Joker's Death, using the pause method is more reliable than the auto-battle method.
